channel.title: Report to Congress & the Nation On Health Care
channel.description:
The following hour-long program presents a taped summary of National Public Radio's six public hearings on problems facing America's health delivery system. In Boston, San Francisco, New York, Philadelphia, Ann Arbor, Michigan, and Atlanta. We heard many opinions expressed. Some more from experts. Others were from simple people who have had problems obtaining health care.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).
